content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at x=-9.5, y=-0.5 to x=1.5, y=6.5
This setup generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
*   Boiler at position (x=-5.0, y=2.5) heating water into steam (fueled with coal).
*   Steam Engine at position (x=1.5, y=6.5) consuming steam to generate power.
*   PipeGroup connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler (fluid=water, position=x=-8.5 y=-0.5, fluid_system=3287).
*   PipeGroup connecting the Boiler to the Steam Engine (fluid=steam, position=x=-3.5 y=2.5, fluid_system=3290).

### Crude Oil Processing Chain from x=17.5, y=40.5 to x=42.5, y=52.5
This setup extracts crude oil, stores it, refines it into petroleum gas, and stores the petroleum gas. It is powered by the steam power generation setup.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Pumpjack at position (x=17.5, y=40.5) extracting crude oil.
*   Storage Tank (Crude Oil) at position (x=19.5, y=45.5) storing the extracted crude oil.
*   Oil Refinery at position (x=34.5, y=50.5) processing crude oil
